WTOBJECT.name: Trainer
WTOBJECT.WTCUSTOM: tmpAgree = Request.Form.Item("Agree") If .CompanyName = "" Then .CompanyName = .NameLast + ", " + .NameFirst If .Website <> "" Then .URL = .Website If Left(.URL,4) <> "http" Then .URL = "http://" + .URL End If

WTERROR.message: OOops, Your Logon Name must be at least three characters/numbers long.
Oops, Your Password must be at least three characters/numbers long.
Oops, You must agree to the terms and conditions.
Oops, The Logon is not available. Please select another.

WTOBJECT.name: Trainer
WTOBJECT.WTCUSTOM: If .CompanyName = "" Then .CompanyName = .NameLast + ", " + .NameFirst If .URL = "" and .Website <> "" Then .URL = .Website If Left(.URL,4) <> "http" Then .URL = "http://" + .URL End If
